title: Barclays CEO Jes Staley Steps Down Amid Pressure Over Epstein Ties
sub_head: U.K. lender says regulators had made preliminary conclusions in investigation into relationship
body:
Jes Staley stepped down as chief executive of Barclays PLC under pressure from regulators about how he characterized his relationship with the convicted sex offender and financier Jeffrey Epstein.
Barclays said Mr. Staley stepped down “in view of the conclusions” made by U.K. regulators in its long-running investigation into what Mr. Staley told Barclays about his association with Mr. Epstein and what Barclays told regulators about the relationship. Barclays shares fell 3% in early trading Monday morning in London.
